channel.title: Leaving BVS
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Leaving BVS" - Donated all possessions to Wiki storehouse

item.title: Re: Leaving BVS
item.content:encoded:
2 members leaving ?! x_X how sadâ€¦

Good luck you both ;) and come back whenever you want ^_^

item.title: Re: Leaving BVS
item.content:encoded: You can only trade duplicate permanent items. But sorry to see you go Kravick. Thanks for hanging out with us, I very much appreciated your help while you were here.

item.title: Re: Leaving BVS
item.content:encoded: I know you are able to trade the Regalia and other monster won items but its not letting me trade them. Is the storehouse full or something?

item.title: Re: Leaving BVS
item.content:encoded: I pretty much feel the same way as Toric at this point. I just feel like logging in less and less to the point where I've just stopped logging in at all. I'm going to donate all my items to the storehouse and what I can't donate I'll sell and donate the money to the village. Good luck in the future guys and thanks for letting me be a part of the Wiki Village Uzuki.

item.title: Re: Leaving BVS
item.content:encoded: I understand how that goes sometimes. You're more than welcome to come back at any time if you decide to change your mind! Thanks for all your support up to now, and I'm sorry to see you go. :(

item.title: Leaving BVS
item.content:encoded: This is basically what the title says, folks. The game's becoming a chore for me, and there's no real reason to keep playing it and taking a spot on the Wiki roster when I'm not having fun. I left all my possessions in the Wiki storehouse, including a Ninja Dog, two Ninja Puppets, and a Soul Glove. Everything except the apparently inseparable K-Dog's Headband I ironically won after I made my decision. They go to whoever needs 'em. No offense toward anyone, it's just become an obligation to make a few dozen clicks every day after work. As my former superior in the Potion Palace Alyson put it, so long and thanks for all the fish. :)
